channel.title: Beyond Vietnam
channel.description:
A speech by Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr., given at Riverside Church in New York City, April 4, 1967, and sponsored by Clergy and Laymen Concerned About Vietnam.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Martin Luther King, Jr. speech, part two
item.description: This program presents the second part of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.'s speech, "Beyond Vietnam."
item.dc:creator: WRVR (Radio station : New York, N.Y.)
item.dc:subject: War & Civil Defense

item.title: Martin Luther King, Jr. speech, part one
item.description: This program presents the first part of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.'s speech, "Beyond Vietnam."
item.dc:creator: WRVR (Radio station : New York, N.Y.)
item.dc:subject: War & Civil Defense
